title: ‏Mohammad Al Gergawi‏ - ‏وزير شؤون مجلس الوزراء بدولة الإمارات العربية المتحدة • UAE Minister of Cabinet Affairs‏ | LinkedIn

organizations.name: Georgetown University
quotes: Al Gergawi has received numerous honors, including honorary doctorates from Georgetown University and ESCP Business School, an Honorary Fellowship of the London Business School, the Order of Friendship from Uzbekistan, the Moroccan Royal Order of Merit, and the American Business Award.
